attributes.magic: Bourne-Again shell script, ASCII text executable, with very long lines (480u)

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Potentially Suspicious Execution From Tmp Folder
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects a potentially suspicious execution of a process located in the '/tmp/' folder
Detects chmod targeting files in abnormal directory paths.
Detects the use of tools that copy files from or to remote systems
Detects usage of command line tools such as "kill", "pkill" or "killall" to terminate or signal a running process.

threat_severity.level_description: Severity HIGH because it was considered trojan. Other contributing factor was that it could not be run in sandboxes.

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert ( gid:116; sid:58; rev:2; msg:"(tcp) experimental TCP options found"; metadata: policy max-detect-ips drop, rule-type decode; classtype:protocol-command-decode;)
